thread.title: SunLink Named Fastest Growing Solar Company in San Francisco Business Times Fast 100
thread.title_full: SunLink Named Fastest Growing Solar Company in San Francisco Business Times Fast 100

author: admin
title: SunLink Named Fastest Growing Solar Company in San Francisco Business Times Fast 100
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 11:51 AM   SunLink Corporation 
SAN RAFAEL, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- SunLink Corporation adds to its list of accolades by earning a top rank in the San Francisco Business Times’ Fast 100 , a ranking of the fastest-growing private companies in the Bay Area. This year’s Fast 100 assessed companies from nearly every industry and found SunLink to be the fastest growing solar company in a region known for its rapid pace of business. Making number 23 on the list of overall companies, SunLink is a leader in the solar energy project solutions space, regarded for its highly engineered products and solar project-related services that have been implemented in connection with more than 1GW of solar projects across North America. 
“The solar industry is at a pivotal point where we’re moving from a decade best described as the 'wild west' to a more mature playing field where the companies with bold vision and solid execution are driving not just renewables but the entire energy sector to the next level. As this award and our growth underscores, SunLink is one of those propelling the industry forward,” said Michael Maulick, CEO of SunLink. “Like so many of our distinguished peers on this list, we’re moving faster and further ahead by removing the barriers that hinder our industry’s momentum; dreaming big and pushing ourselves out of our comfort zone; and investing in an incredibly talented team that is extremely creative and methodical - structurally, and mechanically. In addition we execute! This honor is shared with the entire SunLink family, who are working tirelessly to achieve what we all aspire our company to be – the energy solutions company leading the way to universal solar power adoption and a brighter future for generations to come.” 
The growth recognized by the Fast 100 is illustrated in part by SunLink’s series of successes including new product and service offerings, large customer project wins and a renewed leadership team. SunLink CEO Michael Maulick took the helm starting in January 2015 and has grown his executive team with key hires such as a recently appointed new CFO , Ken Schwarz. Under Maulick’s leadership, the company has completed a key acquisition and, among other initiatives, introduced a significant expansion of its PowerCare service offerings to include solar installation and operations and maintenance (O&M) services for solar project developers. 
For more information about SunLink’s solar project solutions, visit: http://sunlink.com . 
About SunLink 
SunLink Corporation brings powerful solar energy solutions to market through innovative, highly engineered products and in-demand customer services that make solar PV electricity easier, safer, more reliable and less expensive to install. In addition to manufacturing well-designed products that are agile in their implementation, the company leverages unparalleled R&D, a legacy of more than a GW of successful projects, state-of-the-art engineering and creative problem solving to develop optimized, full-scope product+service solutions for roof and ground-mount solar projects of every size and complexity. It is this unique combination of trusted insights, products and services that helps solar developers and installers overcome obstacles and furthers the industry’s shared mission of advancing universal solar power adoption. For more information, visit www.sunlink.com or follow twitter.com/sunlink .
